```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
refquery <- readRDS(here('explore/RDS/07_df.RDS'))
macrophage <- subset(refquery, subset = cell_type_submain %in% c("Monocyte", "M1 Macrophage", "M2 Macrophage"))
rm(refuqery)
macrophage <- ScaleData(object = macrophage)
macrophage <- RunPCA(object = macrophage)
macrophage <- FindNeighbors(macrophage, dims = 1:50)
macrophage <- FindClusters(macrophage, resolution = 0.8)
macrophage <- RunUMAP(object = macrophage, dims = 1:30)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(macrophage, file = "macrophage_journal_replicaton.RDS")
```
